entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 10:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
